/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling highway in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the road below. The highway, divided by a median, stretches out into the distance, flanked by lush green trees on both sides. Cars can be seen moving along the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky overhead is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the landscape. The colors in the image are predominantly green and gray, reflecting the natural and man-made elements of the scene.
